step.datasource: INSERT INTO _AB_LOG_SOX_InvoicePrices_History SELECT CONCAT(DATEPART(YEAR, fakdat), ' - ', DATEPART(MONTH, fakdat)) AS InvMonth, *, GETDATE() AS LogDate FROM dbo._AB_vw_SOX_InvoicePrices_History ip WHERE ip.fak_soort = 'V' -- Only sales orders AND ip.ar_soort IN ('V', 'N') -- Only Sales Items (exclude text rows etc) AND ip.NPrice_order > 0 -- Exclude items in a set AND ip.NPrice_Exact > 0 -- Exclude items without sales price AND ip.esr_aantal > 0 -- Exclude returns AND ip.check_status < 0 -- Only errors AND ip.sysmodified BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY,-1,CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE())) AND CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE()) -- Yesterday AND ip.frhsrgid NOT IN (SELECT frhsrgid FROM _AB_LOG_SOX_InvoicePrices_History) -- prevent double insertion ORDER BY frhsrgid
